When I log an exception, the stack trace is formatted as one looooong line.
Below is my patch for XMLLayout.java (log4j version 1.1.3):

168a169
> 	   buf.append("\r\n");

I have also slightly modified documentation for DOMConfigurator (angle brackets 
were replaced with entity refs):

53c53
<    <log4j:configuration debug=true" 
xmlns:log4j="http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/">
---
>    <log4j:configuration debug="true" 
xmlns:log4j="http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/">
55c55
<    </log4j:configuration>
---
>    </log4j:configuration>
